title: 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Mon Feb 23, 2026 10:04 AM
content:
# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Monday, February 23, 2026 10:04 AM ET

## 🔴 CRITICAL ALERTS

### Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump Tariffs, President Responds With New 15% Global Rate
**Category:** Trade | **Severity:** 🔴 CRITICAL  
Supreme Court ruled Trump's tariffs illegal under IEEPA; Trump immediately retaliated by imposing new 15% blanket tariff on ALL countries, escalating global trade war. Markets in chaos.  
🔗 [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/2026/02/23/politics/trump-tariffs-supreme-court/)

### Trump Mulls Military Strikes on Iran Within Days
**Category:** Military | **Severity:** 🔴 CRITICAL  
President Trump considering targeted strike against Iran followed by potential larger attack. 10-15 day deadline approaching for regime. Inner circle to decide this week.  
🔗 [NY Times](https://www.nytimes.com/2026/02/23/world/middleeast/trump-iran-strike.html)

### Trump Administration Violating Court Orders, Judges Warn
**Category:** Policy | **Severity:** 🔴 CRITICAL  
Federal judges growing angry over Trump administration repeatedly violating their orders across multiple cases, raising constitutional crisis concerns.  
🔗 [NY Times](https://www.nytimes.com/2026/02/23/us/politics/trump-court-orders.html)

### Trump Escalates Trade War After SCOTUS Loss
**Category:** Trade | **Severity:** 🔴 CRITICAL  
Trump administration punts tariff refunds to lower courts while imposing new 15% blanket tariff on all countries after Supreme Court defeat. Trade partners scrambling.  
🔗 [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/politics/trump-trade-war-escalation/)

---

## 🟠 IMPORTANT ALERTS

### Armed Man Shot Dead at Mar-a-Lago
**Category:** Security | **Severity:** 🟠 IMPORTANT  
Secret Service killed armed 21-year-old man from North Carolina who breached security perimeter at Trump's Mar-a-Lago residence. Third security incident this year.  
🔗 [BBC](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-trump-mar-a-lago-shooting)

### China Gains Leverage After Supreme Court Tariff Ruling
**Category:** Trade | **Severity:** 🟠 IMPORTANT  
China's negotiating position strengthens before high-stakes summit as Supreme Court curbs Trump's tariff powers. Beijing sees opening.  
🔗 [CNBC](https://www.cnbc.com/2026/02/23/china-leverage-trump-tariffs.html)

### DHS Shutdown Drags Into Week Two
**Category:** Policy | **Severity:** 🟠 IMPORTANT  
Department of Homeland Security partial shutdown continues as Iran threat and State of the Union clash complicate congressional negotiations. TSA PreCheck briefly suspended.  
🔗 [Fox News](https://www.foxnews.com/politics/dhs-shutdown-week-two)

### Stocks Drop as Trump Raises Tariffs Again
**Category:** Markets | **Severity:** 🟠 IMPORTANT  
Markets sell off as Trump's new tariff announcements create uncertainty and confusion among traders and businesses. S&P down 2%.  
🔗 [CNBC](https://www.cnbc.com/2026/02/23/stocks-trump-tariffs-confusion.html)

---

## 🟡 NOTABLE ALERTS

### Trump Predicts SCOTUS Will Rule Against Birthright Citizenship
**Category:** Policy | **Severity:** 🟡 NOTABLE  
Trump says Supreme Court ruling against birthright citizenship order would benefit China, criticizes Court after tariff loss.  
🔗 [Fox News](https://www.foxnews.com/politics/trump-supreme-court-birthright-citizenship)

### Trump Attacks Republican Supreme Court Justices
**Category:** Social/Political | **Severity:** 🟡 NOTABLE  
President calls GOP-appointed justices who voted against his tariffs an "embarrassment," renews attacks on Supreme Court.  
🔗 [Fox News](https://www.foxnews.com/media/trump-attacks-supreme-court-justices)

### Trump Trade Rep Says Policy "Hasn't Changed" Despite Chaos
**Category:** Trade | **Severity:** 🟡 NOTABLE  
USTR Jamieson Greer insists tariff policy unchanged despite Supreme Court ruling and new tariff announcements causing market chaos.  
🔗 [BBC](https://www.bbc.com/news/business-trump-tariffs-policy)

### Trump Invites US Olympic Hockey Team to State of Union
**Category:** Social | **Severity:** 🟡 NOTABLE  
Trump calls Team USA hockey heroes in locker room, invites them to State of the Union address Tuesday after gold medal win over Canada.  
🔗 [The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/sport/trump-olympic-hockey-state-of-union)

---

## 📊 SUMMARY

**Total Alerts:** 12  
🔴 Critical: 4 | 🟠 Important: 4 | 🟡 Notable: 4

**Top Market Movers:**
1. Supreme Court tariff ruling + Trump's 15% global tariff retaliation
2. Iran military strike planning (10-15 day window)
3. Constitutional crisis warnings from federal judges
4. China gaining negotiating leverage

**Scan Sources:** Google News RSS, Fox News, Reuters, Bloomberg, CNN, BBC, NY Times, CNBC
**Scan Time:** Monday, Feb 23, 2026 10:04 AM ET
